note.p: Sister of Hugh Browne. Daughter of Sarah and Michael Browne, solicitor, of Nottingham. Married William Fox Herbert in Nottinghamshire in 1866.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2129/28/8)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 November 2019)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 November 2019)
